com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage.keycolumnvalue

Interface StoreManager

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    KeyColumnValueStoreManager, KeyValueStoreManager, OrderedKeyValueStoreManager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractStoreManager, DistributedStoreManager, ExpectedValueCheckingStoreManager, InMemoryStoreManager, KCVSManagerProxy, LocalStoreManager, MetricInstrumentedStoreManager, OrderedKeyValueStoreManagerAdapter, TTLKCVSManager

    public interface StoreManager
    Generic interface to a backend storage engine.
    Author:
    Matthias Broecheler (me@matthiasb.com)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StoreTransaction beginTransaction(BaseTransactionConfig config)
      Returns a transaction handle for a new transaction according to the given configuration.
      void clearStorage()
      Deletes and clears all database in this storage manager.
      void close()
      Closes the Storage Manager and all databases that have been opened.
      StoreFeatures getFeatures()
      Returns the features supported by this storage manager
      List<KeyRange> getLocalKeyPartition()
      Returns KeyRanges locally hosted on this machine.
      String getName()
      Return an identifier for the StoreManager.

    • Method Detail

      • beginTransaction

        StoreTransaction beginTransaction(BaseTransactionConfig config)
                           throws BackendException
        Returns a transaction handle for a new transaction according to the given configuration.
        Returns:
        New Transaction Handle
        Throws:
        BackendException

      • close

        void close()
    throws BackendException
        Closes the Storage Manager and all databases that have been opened.
        Throws:
        BackendException

      • clearStorage

        void clearStorage()
           throws BackendException
        Deletes and clears all database in this storage manager.

        ATTENTION: Invoking this method will delete ALL your data!!

        Throws:
        BackendException

      • getFeatures

        StoreFeatures getFeatures()
        Returns the features supported by this storage manager
        Returns:
        The supported features of this storage manager
        See Also:
        StoreFeatures

      • getName

        String getName()
        Return an identifier for the StoreManager. Two managers with the same name would open databases that read and write the same underlying data; two store managers with different names should be, for data read/write purposes, completely isolated from each other.

        Examples:

        • Cassandra keyspace
        • HBase tablename
        • InMemoryStore heap address (i.e. default toString()).
        Returns:
        Name for this StoreManager

      • getLocalKeyPartition

        List<KeyRange> getLocalKeyPartition()
                             throws BackendException
        Returns KeyRanges locally hosted on this machine. The start of each KeyRange is inclusive. The end is exclusive. The start and end must each be at least 4 bytes in length.
        Returns:
        A list of local key ranges
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if the underlying store does not support this operation. Check StoreFeatures.hasLocalKeyPartition() first.
        BackendException
